results.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of National Safe Digging Month.
results.short_title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of National Safe Digging Month.
results.committees: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation Committee
results.latest_major_action: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2684)
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Expresses support for the goals of National Safe Digging Month.  Encourages homeowners and excavators to call 811 before digging.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Expresses support for the goals of National Safe Digging Month.  Encourages homeowners and excavators to call 811 before digging.

actions.description: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2684)
Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2684)
Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. (text of measure as introduced: CR S2496)
